jobDescription: Procore is seeking a Mid-Market Customer Success Manager to focus on building, retaining and growing our Mid-Market Clients. This person will work closely with Procores Install-Based Sales team and act as a liaison between various Procore teams in order to ensure our clients are set up for success.  To be successful in this role, were looking for individuals with a consultative mindset who can quickly understand both Procores Technology and the industries we serve. You will apply best practices and solutions to each client based on their individual business goals and objectives. Youll be instrumental in creating long-lasting Procore partnerships and responsible for delivering ROI analysis for your client base to drive positive client outcomes for Procore. Leveraging this consultative approach, you will deliver Industry and Technology thought leadership while encompassing Procores values of Openness, Optimism and Ownership.  All applicants must have at least 2-5 years experience in account management (preferably in a SaaS environment). Travel required (up to 15-20%).  This position is based in New York City, New York.
